title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies in Practice: Community-Based Medical Education: Exploring Career Preferences

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical knowledge and hospital practicum experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze changes in career preferences by comparing community-based and hospital-based practicum experiences
Learners can explain the impact of community-based education on medical attitudes and patient approaches through case studies
Learners can explore sociological causes of career preference differences based on gender and cultural background
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
